LanguageData.FlagstoneGranite.label: granite flagstone
LanguageData.FlagstoneGranite.description: Roughly-cut stone tiles. These are not beautiful, but they make good surfaces for roads and outdoor walkways. Deconstructing flagstone yields no resources.
LanguageData.FlagstoneLimestone.label: limestone flagstone
LanguageData.FlagstoneLimestone.description: Roughly-cut stone tiles. These are not beautiful, but they make good surfaces for roads and outdoor walkways. Deconstructing flagstone yields no resources.
LanguageData.FlagstoneMarble.label: marble flagstone
LanguageData.FlagstoneMarble.description: Roughly-cut stone tiles. These are not beautiful, but they make good surfaces for roads and outdoor walkways. Deconstructing flagstone yields no resources.
LanguageData.FlagstoneSandstone.label: sandstone flagstone
LanguageData.FlagstoneSandstone.description: Roughly-cut stone tiles. These are not beautiful, but they make good surfaces for roads and outdoor walkways. Deconstructing flagstone yields no resources.
LanguageData.FlagstoneSlate.label: slate flagstone
LanguageData.FlagstoneSlate.description: Roughly-cut stone tiles. These are not beautiful, but they make good surfaces for roads and outdoor walkways. Deconstructing flagstone yields no resources.
LanguageData.TileGranite.label: granite tile
LanguageData.TileGranite.description: Carefully-cut and fit stone tiles for a castle feeling. They are pretty to look at, but they take a long time to lay.
LanguageData.TileLimestone.label: limestone tile
LanguageData.TileLimestone.description: Carefully-cut and fit stone tiles for a castle feeling. They are pretty to look at, but they take a long time to lay.

LanguageData.TileSandstone.description: Carefully-cut and fit stone tiles for a castle feeling. They are pretty to look at, but they take a long time to lay.
